text: The Billings Refinery is an oil refinery located in Billings, Montana. The refinery is currently owned and operated by ExxonMobil. The complex is capable of refining of crude oil per day. ==See also== *List of oil refineries *ExxonMobil ==References== ==External links== * Exxon Mobil website Category:Energy infrastructure in Montana Category:Buildings and structures in Billings, Montana Category:Oil refineries in the United States
title: Billings Refinery (ExxonMobil)
